## topogen run

Deploy and Run the generated config to Cluster.

### Synopsis

Run this command to deploy and run the generated config to the Cluster.

```
topogen run [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -b, --binary string   The binary name to interact with Cluster API. (default "kubectl")
  -h, --help            help for run
```
